title: Don’t mess with Space Bunny
author: VD
content_html: We just got back from the range, and the girl likes to kill paper. Keeps it black, sans laser no less. We broke in one of her friends there – never held, much less fired a gun before, but she’s into it now. If I’m aiming at you, my suggestion is to duck. At 50 feet, I tend to shoot a little high. We did a little window-shopping afterwards and I have to say that I am very much digging the new grip lasers.
content_text: We just got back from the range, and the girl likes to kill paper.  Keeps it black, sans laser no less.  We broke in one of her friends there – never held, much less fired a gun before, but she’s into it now.  If I’m aiming at you, my suggestion is to duck.  At 50 feet, I tend to shoot a little high.  We did a little window-shopping afterwards and I have to say that I am very much digging the new grip lasers.
